Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSMTPClientFuture<E>
    Abstract base class for SMTPClientFuture implementations
    ArrayIterator<E>
    Iterator implementation which wraps a given array
    DataTerminatingInputStream
    InputStream which takes care of correctly terminating the DATA command.
    LMTPRequest  
    ReadySMTPClientFuture<E>
    AbstractSMTPClientFuture implementation which represent a "ready" future.
    SMTPByteArrayMessageImpl
    SMTPByteArrayMessage implementation which just use given byte arrays
    SMTPClientFutureImpl<E>
    Basic SMTPClientFuture implementation
    SMTPMessageImpl
    SMTPMessage implementation which use the given InputStream's
    SMTPMessageSubmitImpl  
    SMTPPipeliningRequestImpl
    POJO implementation of SMTPPipeliningRequest
    SMTPRequestImpl  
    SMTPResponseImpl
    SMTPResponse implementation which use a ArrayList to hold response lines
    StringUtils
    Utility class which helps to convert objects to String's
